Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.model

Class Task.TaskBuilder

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.model.Task.TaskBuilder
Enclosing class:
Task
public static class Task.TaskBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Builder class that is used to create a Task.

    • TaskBuilder

      public TaskBuilder​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String title)
      Constructor for the class TaskBuilder. This constructors requires the bare minimum data required to create a task.
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of the user creating the task.
      title - Title of the task.

    • repeatable

      public Task.TaskBuilder repeatable​(java.lang.Boolean isRepeatable, long timeRepeat)
      Method to set if the task is repeatable and how often it should repeat. A repeatable task will create itself when the deadline runs out.
      Parameters:
      isRepeatable - true / false depending on if it should be repeatable.
      timeRepeat - of often it should repeat in ms.
      Returns:
      the TaskBuilder.

    • deadline

      public Task.TaskBuilder deadline​(long deadline)
      Method to set the task deadline. The deadline is ms since 1/1/1970 UTC +1.
      Parameters:
      deadline - deadline in ms since 1/1/1970 UTC +1.
      Returns:
      the deadline.
